intro.title: Performance Assessment
intro.description: The goal of this document is to highlight and detail steps needed to improve site performance.

performance-basics/Accessibility.title: Accessibility
performance-basics/Accessibility.description: - Evaluate how well users with disabilities can access and use your site. It checks for compliance with accessibility standards and identifies potential barriers.

performance-basics/Best-Practices.title: Best Practices
performance-basics/Best-Practices.description: - Assesses adherence to general web development best practices, including security aspects, browser compatibility, and code quality.

performance-basics/Performance.title: Performance
performance-basics/Performance.description: - Analyzes loading speed, responsiveness, and how efficiently your site uses resources. It measures metrics like First Contentful Paint, Largest Contentful Paint, and Time to Interactive.

performance-basics/SEO.title: SEO
performance-basics/SEO.description: - Examines how well your pages are optimized for search engines, checking for proper use of meta tags, structured data, and mobile-friendliness.
